title: The Choice - (The Returned 0.7) - Jason Mott.epub
description:
In this short story by Jason Mott, author of The Returned, a man is forced to choose between the life he has now, and the one he thought was gone foreverÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

In the years after her death, he had finally moved on, gotten married, started a family. He is content with his life nowÃ¢â‚¬â€happy, evenÃ¢â‚¬Â¦. Until Tracy suddenly and inexplicably returns.

For weeks, Peter and his wife, Samantha, have been watching mysterious reports of people's loved ones returning from beyond, the world spinning into uncertainty and chaos. But they never imagined it would happen to them. With Tracy's unusual homecoming, Peter and Samantha must decide where they can possibly go from here, and whether their family can surviveÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.
